title: Can give me an account pbe fast pls
body:
My motive is not to disturb but they can hurry a little
I just want that account because it's my dream to have all the champions and skins

replies.body: Thanks i wait for my account

Unfortunately, we cannot manually review PBE Applications. The best thing you can do while waiting on your application is to *actively* play league and *positively influence others* in your games, as we look for those traits when selecting testers, among other criteria that change a lot, depending on what we're testing at the time.

I recommend reading through our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) if you have further interest in how the system works. If there were any questions you had that the FAQ was unable to answer, feel free to hit me up!
